_comment: This xAPI statement attempts to fully map all the data represented in the canonical sample event here https://edx.readthedocs.io/projects/devdata/en/latest/internal_data_formats/tracking_logs/sample_events.html

verb._comment: The tracking event type this sample corresponds to is 'problem_check'

object._comment: This URL is a placeholder utilizing the 'usage_key'.  Should be instance specific, but perhaps transferable across domains?

name.en-US: Which of the following is a fruit?
name.es-ES: ¿Cuál de las siguientes es una fruta?

description.en-US: A diagnostic assessment related to fruit literacy.

object._comment1: The choicehint content feels most natural here in the activity definition rather than the response.  It is packed into the user response in the current event format.

extensions.https://openedx.org/xapi/choicehint:
<choicehint selected="true">You are correct that an apple is a fruit because it is the fertilized ovary that comes from an apple tree and contains seeds.</choicehint>
      <choicehint selected="false">Remember that an apple is also a fruit.</choicehint>

result._comment: The response in Open edX events contains extra data about hints, what is the rationale for that, does it have a better home?

29c5cbd840324d94be8ba51db1864277_2_1.msg:
Incorrect:
You are correct that an apple is a fruit because it is the fertilized ovary that comes from an apple tree and contains seeds.
Remember that a pumpkin is also a fruit.
You are correct that a potato is a vegetable because it is an edible part of a plant in tuber form.
Many people mistakenly think a tomato is a vegetable. However, because a tomato is the fertilized ovary of a tomato plant and contains seeds, it is a fruit.
